projects.name: TO-DO List
projects.description: Task Management: Users can add new tasks by entering a description in a text field and clicking the 'Add Task' button. Task Deletion: Users can select a task from the list and remove it by clicking the 'Remove Task' button. This action updates the task list dynamically. Event Handling: Action listeners are used to handle user interactions with buttons (Add Task, Remove Task). This ensures responsiveness and interactivity in the application.

projects.name: Craft Heaven
projects.description: - Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, MySQL. - Enables artisans to create profiles, list products, and manage transactions securely. Focuses on providing a seamless experience for buyers. - Security measures include user authentication, data encryption, and secure transactions.

projects.name: Banking System
projects.description: Simulate a simple banking system using Java and Graphic User Interface. Create and manage accounts. Deposit and withdraw money. Track account balances of User. Transfer money between accounts.

experiences.description: During my internship, I successfully completed three projects utilizing Java, gaining hands-on experience in software development. These projects involved designing and implementing key features, writing clean and efficient code, and collaborating with a team to deliver solutions on time. I enhanced my skills in Java programming, debugging, and problem-solving while working in a fast-paced environment. This experience provided me with practical knowledge of object-oriented programming, version control, and project management.
